# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 
-  Two burner inserters at positions (x=39.5 y=-79.5) and (x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that steam engine is connected to the power grid before using it.
### Errors when using entities without being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
